deep_animate[source]

deep_animate(source:"Path to the source image.", driving:"Path to the driving video.", config:"Path to configuration file", checkpoint:"Path to model", dest:"Path to save the generated video"='generated_video.mp4', relative:"Relative"=True, adapt_movement_scale:"Adaptive moment scale"=True)
